entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 16 March 2023
